title: Che significa?
body:
Quando Aatrox dice: Che sorridere io so, e sorridendo, assassinare.
Cosa significa correttamente?

replies.body:
Un riferimento a Shakespear.

http://shakespeare.mit.edu/3henryvi/3henryvi.3.2.html

And from that torment I will free myself,
Or hew my way out with a bloody axe.
Why, I can smile, and murder whiles I smile,
And cry 'Content' to that which grieves my heart,

> [{quoted}](name=立 Hallelujah 立,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=BbR1Kolw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-13T21:36:22.974+0000)
>
> Un riferimento a Shakespear.
> 
> http://shakespeare.mit.edu/3henryvi/3henryvi.3.2.html
> 
> And from that torment I will free myself,
> Or hew my way out with a bloody axe.
> Why, I can smile, and murder whiles I smile,
> And cry 'Content' to that which grieves my heart,

Bello! Non lo sapevo
